element.panel_attributes: msg_base -- //Stores the version of the message protocol +PROTOCOL_VERSION : static constexpr uint32_t = 1 //Stores the protocol version attribute name +PROT_VER_FIELD_NAME : static const string = "prot_ver" //Stores the message type attribute name +MSG_TYPE_FIELD_NAME : static const string = "msg_type" #m_json : json -- msg_base() /+~msg_base {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- Is a base class for all messages -- Stores the all-messages field names and the json object

response_msg -- //Stores the status code attribute name +STAT_CODE_FIELD_NAME : static const string = "stat_code" //Stores the status message attribute name +STAT_MSG_FIELD_NAME : static const string = "stat_msg" -- response_msg() /+~response_msg {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for response messages
request_msg -- -- request_msg() /+~request_msg {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for request messages
supp_lang_req_out -- -- +supp_lang_req_out() /+~supp_lang_req_out() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The outgoing supported languages request
supp_lang_req_in -- - inc_msg : incoming_msg *; -- +supp_lang_req_in( msg_ptr : incoming_msg *) /+~supp_lang_req_in() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The incoming supported languages request

trans_job_req_out -- -- +trans_job_req_out(job_id : const job_id_type, source_lang : const string &, source_text : vector<string> &, target_lang : const string &, is_trans_info : const bool) -- Responsibilities -- The outgoing translation job request
supp_lang_resp -- +LANGUAGES_FIELD_NAME : string = "langs" -- +supp_lang_resp() /+~supp_lang_resp() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for supported languages response

trans_job_req -- +JOB_ID_FIELD_NAME : string = "job_id" +SOURCE_LANG_FIELD_NAME : string = "source_lang" +TARGET_LANG_FIELD_NAME : string = "target_lang" +IS_TRANS_INFO_FIELD_NAME : string = "is_trans_info" +SOURCE_SENTENCES_FIELD_NAME : string = "source_sent" -- +trans_job_req() /+~trans_job_req() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for translation job request
supp_lang_req -- -- +supp_lang_req() /+~supp_lang_req() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for supported languages request

trans_job_resp -- +JOB_ID_FIELD_NAME : string = "job_id" +TARGET_DATA_FIELD_NAME : string = "target_data" -- +trans_job_resp() /+~trans_job_resp() {virtual}/ -- Responsibilities -- The base class for translation job response

trans_job_resp_in -- {innerclass sent_iterator -- -m_data : json & -m_idx : const size_t -m_sent_data : trans_sent_data_in -- +sent_iterator(trans_data : const json &, idx : size_t) +operator*() : const trans_send_data_in & {const} +operator++() : sent_iterator & +operator!=(other : const sent_iterator &) : bool {const} +operator=(other : const sent_iterator &) innerclass} - inc_msg : incoming_msg *; -- +trans_job_resp_in( inc_msg : incoming_msg *) /+~trans_job_resp_in( ) {virtual}/ +begin() : sent_iterator {const} +end() : sent_iterator {const} +get_job_id() : job_id_type {const} +get_inc_msg() : const incoming_msg & {const} +get_status_code() : trans_job_code +get_status_msg() : const json::string_t & -- Responsibilities -- The incoming translation job response

supp_lang_resp_out -- -- +supp_lang_resp_out() /+~supp_lang_resp_out() {virtual}/ +add_supp_lang(source : const string&, target : const string& ) : void -- Responsibilities -- The outgoing supported languages response

supp_lang_resp_in -- - inc_msg : incoming_msg *; -- typedef map<string,vector<string> > supp_lang_map +supp_lang_resp_in(inc_msg : incoming_msg *) /+~supp_lang_resp_in() {virtual}/ +get_languages() : const supp_lang_map & {const} -- Responsibilities -- The incoming supported languages response

trans_job_resp_out -- -m_sent_data : trans_sent_data_out * -- +trans_job_resp_out() /+~trans_job_resp_out() {virtual}/ +set_job_id(job_id : job_id_type) : void +add_new_sent_data() : trans_sent_data_out & +set_status(code : status_code, msg : const string &) : void -- Responsibilities -- The outgoing translation job response

outgoing_msg -- -- +outgoing_msg(type : msg_type) +set_value( field_name : const string &, value : const vlaue_type &) : void +serialize() : string #get_json() : json & _+set_value(data : json::object_t &, field_name : const string &, value : const vlaue_type &) : void_ -- Responsibilities -- Is a base class for all outgoing messages

incoming_msg -- -- +client_msg() +de_serialize(data : const string &) : void +template<typename T> get_value(name: const string &) : T +get_type() : msg_type +get_json() : const json & #verify_protocol_version() : void _+template<typename T> get_value(data : json::object_t &, name: const string &) : const T &_ +template<typename T> get_value(name: const string &) : const T & -- Responsibilities -- Is a base class for all incoming messages

trans_sent_data -- +TRANS_TEXT_FIELD_NAME : string = "trans_text" +STACK_LOAD_FIELD_NAME : string = "stack_load" # m_data_obj : json::object_t & -- +trans_sent_data(data_obj : json::object_t &) /+~trans_sent_data() {virtual}/ +set_sent_data(json::object_t &) : void -- Responsibilities -- Stores the translation data for a sentence

trans_sent_data_in -- typedef vector<int64_t> loads_array -- +trans_sent_data_in(data_obj : json::object_t &) /+~trans_sent_data_in() {virtual}/ +has_stack_load() : bool {const} +get_status_code() : status_code +get_status_msg() : const string & +get_trans_text() : const string & +get_stack_load() : const loads_array & -- Responsibilities -- Represents the translated sentence data

trans_sent_data_out -- -m_is_trans_info : bool -- +trans_sent_data_in(data_obj : json &, is_trans_info: const bool & ) /+~trans_sent_data_in() {virtual}/ +is_trans_info() : bool {const} +set_status( code : status_code, msg : string ) : void +set_trans_text(const json::string_t &) : void +set_stack_load(const json::array_t &) : void -- Responsibilities -- Represents the translated sentence data
